mapper.select: SELECT a.iltSeq ,a.iltIftcSeq ,a.iltTitle ,a.iltBody ,a.iltPrice ,b.iftcName ,b.iftcSeq ,c.pseq ,c.path ,c.uuidName ,d.path as teacherPath ,d.uuidName as teacherUuidName FROM idLecture a LEFT JOIN infrTeacher b on a.iltIftcSeq = b.iftcSeq LEFT JOIN lectureUpload c on c.pseq = a.iltSeq LEFT JOIN teacherUpload d on d.pseq = b.iftcSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.iltSeq = #{iltSeq} AND c.pseq = #{iltSeq} ;

select a.wrSeq , a.wrIltSeq , a.wrIctSeq , a.wrIfmmSeq , a.wrWatchedLength , b.ictVideoUrl from watchRecord a left join idChapter b on a.wrIctSeq = b.ictSeq where 1=1 AND wrIltSeq = #{iltSeq} AND wrIfmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}

select a.ictSeq , a.ictSort , a.ictTitle , a.ictVideoUrl , c.iltSeq from idChapter a left join idChapterHeader b on b.ichSeq = a.ictIchSeq left join idLecture c on b.ichSeq = c.iltSeq where 1=1 AND a.ictSeq = #{ictSeq}

select a.ichSeq ,a.ichIltSeq , c.iltTitle , a.ichTitle , b.ictSort , b.ictSeq , b.ictTitle , b.ictIchSeq from idChapterHeader a left join idChapter b on a.ichSeq = b.ictIchSeq left join idLecture c on a.ichIltSeq = c.iltSeq where 1=1 AND c.iltSeq = #{iltSeq} order by b.ictSort asc ;
select a.ichSeq ,a.ichIltSeq ,a.ichTitle from idChapterHeader a left join idLecture c on a.ichIltSeq = c.iltSeq where 1=1 AND c.iltSeq = #{iltSeq} ;
SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmName FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId} AND a.ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
SELECT a.iftcSeq ,a.iftcId ,a.iftcPassword ,a.iftcName FROM infrTeacher a WHERE 1=1 AND a.iftcId = #{iftcId} AND a.iftcPassword = #{iftcPassword}

select a.ictSeq , a.ictIchSeq , a.ictSort , a.ictTitle , a.ictVideoUrl , b.ichSeq , b.ichIltSeq , b.ichTitle , c.iltSeq , c.iltTitle , d.iftcName from idChapter a left join idChapterHeader b on a.ictIchSeq = b.ichSeq left join idLecture c on b.ichIltSeq = c.iltSeq left join infrTeacher d on c.iltIftcSeq = d.iftcSeq where 1=1 AND iltSeq = #{iltSeq}

select a.iltTitle ,a.iltSeq ,a.iltPrice ,b.iftcSeq ,b.iftcName ,c.path ,c.uuidName ,(select count(*) from idPayment f where f.ipmIltSeq = "1") as count ,(select TRUNCATE(RAND()*(5-4)+4, 1)) as random from idLecture a inner join infrTeacher b on b.iftcSeq = a.iltIftcSeq inner join lectureUpload c on c.pseq = a.iltSeq left join infrMember d on d.ifmmSeq = a.iltIfmmSeq left join idOrder e on e.iodIfmmSeq = d.ifmmSeq left join idPayment f on f.ipmIodSeq = e.iodSeq where 1=1 order by rand() limit 3

select a.iltTitle ,a.iltSeq ,a.iltPrice ,b.iftcSeq ,b.iftcName ,c.path ,c.uuidName from idLecture a inner join infrTeacher b on b.iftcSeq = a.iltIftcSeq inner join lectureUpload c on c.pseq = a.iltSeq left join infrMember d on d.ifmmSeq = a.iltIfmmSeq left join idOrder e on e.iodIfmmSeq = d.ifmmSeq left join idPayment f on f.ipmIodSeq = e.iodSeq where 1=1 order by iltSeq desc limit 4
